metadata.title: USN-6762-1 -- GNU C Library vulnerabilities
metadata.description: It was discovered that GNU C Library incorrectly handled netgroup requests. An attacker could possibly use this issue to cause a crash or execute arbitrary code. This issue only affected Ubuntu 14.04 LTS. (CVE-2014-9984)  It was discovered that GNU C Library might allow context-dependent attackers to cause a denial of service. This issue only affected Ubuntu 14.04 LTS. (CVE-2015-20109)  It was discovered that GNU C Library when processing very long pathname arguments to the realpath function, could encounter an integer overflow on 32-bit architectures, leading to a stack-based buffer overflow and, potentially, arbitrary code execution. This issue only affected Ubuntu 14.04 LTS. (CVE-2018-11236)  It was discovered that the GNU C library getcwd function incorrectly handled buffers. An attacker could use this issue to cause the GNU C Library to crash, resulting in a denial of service, or possibly execute arbitrary code. This issue only affected Ubuntu 14.04 LTS. (CVE-2021-3999)  Charles Fol discovered that the GNU C Library iconv feature incorrectly handled certain input sequences. An attacker could use this issue to cause the GNU C Library to crash, resulting in a denial of service, or possibly execute arbitrary code. (CVE-2024-2961)  Update Instructions:  Run `sudo pro fix USN-6762-1` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected by updating your system to the following package versions:  libc-bin - 2.23-0ubuntu11.3+esm6 glibc-doc - 2.23-0ubuntu11.3+esm6 libc6-i386 - 2.23-0ubuntu11.3+esm6 libc6-s390 - 2.23-0ubuntu11.3+esm6 libc6-dev-i386 - 2.23-0ubuntu11.3+esm6 libc6-armel - 2.23-0ubuntu11.3+esm6 libc6-dev-x32 - 2.23-0ubuntu11.3+esm6 multiarch-support - 2.23-0ubuntu11.3+esm6 libc6-dev - 2.23-0ubuntu11.3+esm6 libc6-amd64 - 2.23-0ubuntu11.3+esm6 libc6-x32 - 2.23-0ubuntu11.3+esm6 libc6-dev-amd64 - 2.23-0ubuntu11.3+esm6 nscd - 2.23-0ubuntu11.3+esm6 libc-dev-bin - 2.23-0ubuntu11.3+esm6 libc6 - 2.23-0ubuntu11.3+esm6 locales-all - 2.23-0ubuntu11.3+esm6 libc6-pic - 2.23-0ubuntu11.3+esm6 libc6-dev-s390 - 2.23-0ubuntu11.3+esm6 glibc-source - 2.23-0ubuntu11.3+esm6 libc6-dev-armel - 2.23-0ubuntu11.3+esm6 locales - 2.23-0ubuntu11.3+esm6 Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro
